dialogue.speaker: Customer
dialogue.text: I’m calling again because my phone bill this month is still incorrect.

dialogue.speaker: Agent
dialogue.text: I’m really sorry to hear that, Mr. Miller. Let me pull up your account.

dialogue.speaker: Customer
dialogue.text: This is getting ridiculous. I thought we resolved this last month.

dialogue.speaker: Agent
dialogue.text: I completely understand your frustration. I see the adjustment from last month was processed.

dialogue.speaker: Customer
dialogue.text: Then why is my current bill still higher than it should be?

dialogue.speaker: Agent
dialogue.text: It looks like new international charges appeared this month.

dialogue.speaker: Customer
dialogue.text: Again, I didn’t make any international calls. This is unacceptable.

dialogue.speaker: Agent
dialogue.text: I believe you. Let me check the call logs to confirm.

dialogue.speaker: Customer
dialogue.text: You said that last time. This keeps happening.

dialogue.speaker: Agent
dialogue.text: You’re right, and I’m going to escalate this case to a senior investigations team.

dialogue.speaker: Customer
dialogue.text: What do you mean escalate? Why isn’t it resolved now?

dialogue.speaker: Agent
dialogue.text: We need to conduct a deeper review of the account activity to determine the cause.

dialogue.speaker: Customer
dialogue.text: And how long will that take? I want a timeline.

dialogue.speaker: Agent
dialogue.text: Typically, our investigations team resolves such issues within 7 business days.

dialogue.speaker: Customer
dialogue.text: So I’m just supposed to wait again? That’s not good enough.

dialogue.speaker: Agent
dialogue.text: I understand your concern, but I promise to monitor the case personally.

dialogue.speaker: Customer
dialogue.text: You promised last time too. I’m losing faith in your company.

dialogue.speaker: Agent
dialogue.text: I assure you we’re taking this seriously. I’ll also waive any late fees for this month.

dialogue.speaker: Customer
dialogue.text: You better. I’m not paying another inflated bill.

dialogue.speaker: Agent
dialogue.text: We’ll make sure the correct amount is reflected once the investigation is complete.

dialogue.speaker: Customer
dialogue.text: And what if it isn’t? What’s my recourse then?

dialogue.speaker: Agent
dialogue.text: If we fail to resolve it, you can request a formal review by the compliance department.

dialogue.speaker: Customer
dialogue.text: Maybe I should just switch providers.

dialogue.speaker: Agent
dialogue.text: I really hope you’ll give us a chance to fix this before making that decision.

dialogue.speaker: Customer
dialogue.text: You have 7 business days. That’s it.

dialogue.speaker: Agent
dialogue.text: Understood. I’ll document your expectations clearly in the case file.

dialogue.speaker: Customer
dialogue.text: I’ll be checking back. Don’t let me down again.

dialogue.speaker: Agent
dialogue.text: I won’t. You’ll hear back from me directly with updates.

dialogue.speaker: Customer
dialogue.text: Alright. Goodbye.

dialogue.speaker: Agent
dialogue.text: Thank you for your patience, Mr. Miller. Goodbye.
